data.title: Acción Global para la Anulación de la Deuda
data.text:
Join the Global Action for Debt Cancellation, that took place between October 10th and 17th.

Join the Global Week adding the name of your organisation here. You can check out the details of the call for action here.

Sign the Open Letter to All Governments, International Institutions and Lenders - you can sign here (letter available also in spanish and french). Please also help us disseminate.

Join the "Sound the Alarm" action on social media. You can check the details here.

Watch the Concert/Rally "Rise to the Beat of Debt Justice" that APMDD and Action Aid International have organised for the 14th of October (download the poster here).
